Set Next Space.code:
; NAME: Set Next Space
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|Next

ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP

ADD A0 R0 V0 ; Assigns Current Player Index to A0
ADDIU A1 R0 Next_chain_index ; Assigns Chain Index to A1
ADDIU A2 R0 Next_chain_space_index ; Assigns Space Index to A2

JAL SetNextChainAndSpace 
NOP


LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

Set Previous Space.code:
; NAME: Set Previous Space
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|Prev

ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP

ADD A0 R0 V0 ; Assigns Current Player Index to A0
ADDIU A1 R0 Prev_chain_index ; Assigns Chain Index to A1
ADDIU A2 R0 Prev_chain_space_index ; Assigns Space Index to A2

JAL SetPrevChainAndSpace 
NOP


LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

Set Next Space (Reverse Merge).code:
; NAME: Set Next Space (Reverse Merge)
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|Next

ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S1 32(SP)
SW S0 28(SP)

; Get current player's status.
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
SLL V1 V0 3
SUBU V1 V1 V0
SLL V0 V1 3
LUI S1 hi(p1_status_flags)
ADDU S1 S1 V0
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(p1_status_flags)

; Check if player is not under any Reverse influence.
LBU S0 0(S1)
ANDI A0 S0 0x80 ; Status bit for resetting status after landing (implies Reverse)
BNEZ A0 exit
NOP

; Load the board ram address with the convenience time flag at T0.
LUI T0 hi(board_ram10)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(board_ram10)
; Load the value at T1.
LBU T1 0(T0)

; Convenience Flag
; 0000 0000 Day (Dawn)
; 0001 0000 Day
; 0000 0001 Night (Dusk)
; 0001 0001 Night

; Check if it is Night.
ANDI A0 T1 0x1 ; Bit indicating Night
BEQZ A0 exit
NOP

setnext:
; Set player to be going backwards at Night.
ORI S0 S0 0x1 ; Status bit for going backwards.
SB S0 0(S1)

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP

ADD A0 R0 V0 ; Assigns Current Player Index to A0
ADDIU A1 R0 Next_chain_index ; Assigns Chain Index to A1
ADDIU A2 R0 Next_chain_space_index ; Assigns Space Index to A2

JAL SetNextChainAndSpace 
NOP

exit:
LW RA 36(SP)
LW S1 32(SP)
LW S0 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

Set Next Space (Reverse Gap).code:
; NAME: Set Next Space (Reverse Gap)
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|Next

ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S1 32(SP)
SW S0 28(SP)

; Get current player's status.
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
SLL V1 V0 3
SUBU V1 V1 V0
SLL V0 V1 3
LUI S1 hi(p1_status_flags)
ADDU S1 S1 V0
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(p1_status_flags)

; Check if player is moving backwards.
LBU S0 0(S1)
ANDI A0 S0 0x01 ; Status bit for moving backwards
BEQ A0 R0 exit
NOP

XORI S0 S0 0x01 ; Erase the status bit for moving backwards and store
SB S0 0(S1)

setnext:
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP

ADD A0 R0 V0 ; Assigns Current Player Index to A0
ADDIU A1 R0 Next_chain_index ; Assigns Chain Index to A1
ADDIU A2 R0 Next_chain_space_index ; Assigns Space Index to A2

JAL SetNextChainAndSpace 
NOP

exit:
LW RA 36(SP)
LW S1 32(SP)
LW S0 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

Iterate Day Cycle.code:
; NAME: Iterate Day Cycle
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct

ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)

; Load the board ram address that stores the time of day at T2.
LUI T2 hi(board_ram9)
ADDIU T2 T2 lo(board_ram9)
; Load the value at T3.
LBU T3 0(T2)

; Check the current day cycle turn, set at T4.
ANDI T4 T3 0xF ; 0000 1111 bit mask

; Check if solstice event is happening, set at T5.
ANDI T5 T3 0x30 ; 0011 0000 bit mask

; Day bits
; 0000 0000 0x00
; 0000 0001 0x01
; 0000 0010 0x02
; 0001 0000  0x10
; 0001 0001  0x11
; 0001 0010  0x12
; 0001 0011  0x13
; 0010 0001   0x21
; 0010 0010   0x22

; Night bits
; 0000 0011 0x03
; 0000 0111 0x07
; 0000 1011 0x0B
; 0001 0111  0x17
; 0001 1011  0x1B
; 0010 0011   0x23
; 0010 0111   0x27
; 0010 1011   0x2B
; 0010 0000   0x20

; Skip checks if solstice event isn't happening.
BEQZ T5 checkCycle
NOP

; Extended Day flag is 0001 0000
; Extended Night flag is 0010 0000
ANDI T7 T5 0x10 ; 0001 0000 bit mask
BEQZ T7 checkNightSolstice ; assume extended night if not extended day
NOP

checkDaySolstice:
LI T7 0x1B ; Night bit that should end solstice event (day)
BNE T3 T7 checkCycle
NOP

; Remove solstice flag as the event ended.
ANDI T3 T3 0xCF ; 1100 1111 bit mask

J checkCycle
NOP

checkNightSolstice:
LI T7 0x22 ; Day bit that should end solstice event (night)
BNE T3 T7 checkCycle
NOP

; Remove solstice flag as the event ended.
ANDI T3 T3 0xCF ; 1100 1111 bit mask

checkCycle:
SLTI T6 T4 0x03 ; is T4 < 3? (covers the first 3 Day bits)
BNEZ T6 iterateOne
NOP

SLTI T6 T4 0xB ; is T4 < 0xB? (covers all except the last Night bits)
BNEZ T6 iterateFour
NOP

; Reset Cycle since we reached the end.
resetCycle:
ANDI T3 T3 0xF0 ; 1111 0000 bit mask
SB T3 0(T2)

J setFlag
NOP

iterateOne:
ADDIU T3 T3 1 ; iterate Day by 1
SB T3 0(T2)

J setFlag
NOP

iterateFour:
ADDIU T3 T3 4 ; iterate Night by 4
SB T3 0(T2)

setFlag:
; Load the board ram address with the convenience time flag.
LUI T0 hi(board_ram10)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(board_ram10)

; Convenience Flag
; 0000 0000 Day (Dawn)
; 0001 0000 Day
; 0000 0001 Night (Dusk)
; 0001 0001 Night

LI T1 0x00 
BEQ T3 T1 setDayDawn
NOP
LI T1 0x01
BEQ T3 T1 setDay
NOP

LI T1 0x03 
BEQ T3 T1 setNightDusk
NOP
LI T1 0x07
BEQ T3 T1 setNight
NOP

LI T1 0x10
BEQ T3 T1 setDayDawn
NOP
LI T1 0x11
BEQ T3 T1 setDay
NOP

LI T1 0x17 
BEQ T3 T1 setNightDusk
NOP
LI T1 0x1B
BEQ T3 T1 setNight
NOP

LI T1 0x21
BEQ T3 T1 setDayDawn
NOP
LI T1 0x22
BEQ T3 T1 setDay
NOP

LI T1 0x23 
BEQ T3 T1 setNightDusk
NOP
LI T1 0x27
BEQ T3 T1 setNight
NOP

; Don't change anything.
J exit
NOP

setDay:
LI T1 0x10
SB T1 0(T0)
J exit
NOP

setNight:
LI T1 0x11
SB T1 0(T0)
J exit
NOP

setDayDawn:
LI T1 0x00
SB T1 0(T0)
J exit
NOP

setNightDusk:
LI T1 0x01
SB T1 0(T0)

exit:
LW RA 36(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

Set Backwards (Landing Space).code:
; NAME: Set Backwards (Landing Space)
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct

ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S1 32(SP)
SW S0 28(SP)

; Make sure this is a landable event on every space that is effected by Day/Night changes.

; Load the board ram address with the convenience time flag at T0.
LUI T0 hi(board_ram10)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(board_ram10)
; Load the value at T1.
LBU T1 0(T0)

; Convenience Flag
; 0000 0000 Day (Dawn)
; 0001 0000 Day
; 0000 0001 Night (Dusk)
; 0001 0001 Night

; Check if it is Night.
ANDI A0 T1 0x1 ; Bit indicating Night
BEQZ A0 exit
NOP

; Get current player's next chain index, get status and other things using an offset.
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
SLL V1 V0 3
SUBU V1 V1 V0
SLL V0 V1 3
LUI S0 hi(p1_next_chain_index)
ADDU S0 S0 V0
ADDIU S0 S0 lo(p1_next_chain_index)

LBU T0 0(S0) ; Get the next chain index.
LBU T1 1(S0) ; Get the next chain space index.
LBU T2 4(S0) ; Get the prev chain index.
LBU T3 5(S0) ; Get the prev chain space index.
LBU S1 6(S0) ; Get the player status flag.

BNEZ S1 exit ; Skip if player is already going backwards.
NOP

; Set the player's next space to be the previous space.
SB T0 4(S0)
SB T1 5(S0)
; Set the player's previous space to be the next space.
SB T2 0(S0) 
SB T3 1(S0)

; Set player to be going backwards at Night.
ORI S1 S1 0x1 ; Status bit for going backwards.
SB S1 6(S0)

exit:
LW RA 36(SP)
LW S1 32(SP)
LW S0 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

Moving Gear Warp (No Duel).code:
; NAME: Moving Gear Warp (No Duel)
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space[]|WarpableSpaces
; PARAM: Space|DropOffSpace
; PARAM: Space|CurrentPlayerDropOffSpace

; WarpableSpaces is an array of spaces that, should a player be on any of them,
; they will get warped whenever this event is called.

; DropOffSpace is the space that all effected players will be placed.
; This space has to be an empty space, and must have a chain of at least 2 spaces.
; A good example would be to drop off the players at the Start space.

; CurrentPlayerDropOffSpace is the space that, should the current active player be warped,
; will be placed on. CurrentPlayerDropOffSpace must be an empty space (likely connected
; to be after the DropOffSpace) that has X/Y coordinates identical to the DropOffSpace.
; This prevents a duel from being triggered during the last 5 turns because of the warp.

; This code does not handle situations if you set the DropOffSpace to any other space type,
; a bug will happen where the player lands on the DropOffSpace rather than the space
; that triggered the event, meaning they can get coins from a Blue Space, a hidden block, etc.

; Default behavior is for landing on a Happening Space.
; Look up different screen transitions, and set them in the line at fadeOut if you want
; a screen transition that isn't related to Happening.

; Credit: Code repurposed from various warp events created by Airsola™ and MarioComix

ADDIU SP SP -80 ; Including 4 byte pad
SW RA 76(SP)
SW S7 72(SP)
SW S6 68(SP)
SW S5 64(SP)
SW S4 60(SP)
SW S3 56(SP)
SW S2 52(SP)
SW S1 48(SP)
SW S0 44(SP)

; S0 Current index of space Array
; S1 WarpableSpaces chain_index Array
; S2 WarpableSpaces chain_space_index Array
; S3 WarpableSpaces Array Length
; S4 Player index
; S5 Float offset for X position
; S6 WarpableSpaces chain_index at current index
; S7 WarpableSpaces chain_space_index at current index

; Fade out and remove the players on warpable spaces.
fadeOut:
ADDIU A0 R0 0x04 ; Happening (?) Fade
JAL 0x80062050 ; InitFadeOut
LI A1 16 ; 16 frames

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; wait 17 frames

JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 R0 0x323 ; Cog spinning sound

; S1 contains the array for chain_index of each warpable space, starts at 0.
LUI S1 hi(ArrayChain)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(ArrayChain)

; S2 contains the array for chain_space_index of each warpable space, starts at 0.
LUI S2 hi(ArrayChainSpace)
ADDIU S2 S2 lo(ArrayChainSpace)

; S3 contains the length of the array.
LUI S0 hi(ArrayLength)
ADDIU S0 S0 lo(ArrayLength)
LBU S3 1(S0)

; S5 contains the float offset to place each player model's X position.
LI S5 0x00000000 ; float value for 0

; S0 is the index to be iterated through for the space array.
ADDU S0 R0 R0 ;set to 0

;;;;;; Loop through all the warpable spaces to see if there are players present.
loopSpaces:

; S4 is used to search through each player index: [0, 1, 2, 3]
ADDU S4 R0 R0 ;set to 0

; S6 is the chain_index of the array at index S0
LBU S6 1(S1)
; S7 is the chain_space_index of the array at index S0
LBU S7 1(S2)

;;;;;; Loop through all the players.
loopPlayers:
; Set the address for p1_char under T5.
LUI T5 hi(p1_char) 
ADDIU T5 T5 lo(p1_char) ; we will use the offset from this address to get the other players

LI T6 0x38 ; load offset between player structs at T6
MULTU T6 S4 ; multiply offset by player index
NOP
MFLO T6 ; store result of multiply at T6
NOP

ADDU T5 T5 T6 ; add player offset to p#_char

; Check if the player's cur_chain_index and cur_space_index match a warpable space.
; T1 is the chain_index of the player.
ADDIU T0 T5 12 ; offset for p#_cur_chain_index from p#_char
LBU T1 0(T0)
BNE S6 T1 ignorePlayer ; ignore moving the player if the chain index is not equal.
NOP
; T2 is the chain_space_index of the player.
ADDIU T0 T5 13 ; offset for p#_cur_space_index from p#_char
LBU T2 0(T0)
BNE S7 T2 ignorePlayer ; ignore moving the player if the space index is not equal.
NOP

movePlayer:
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; event triggering player index at V0
NOP
MOVE T4 V0 ; store current player index at T4

BEQ T4 S4 isCurrentPlayer ; move current (landing) player to a different space
NOP

isOtherPlayer:
; Set the player's space to the drop off space.
MOVE A0 S4
LI A1 DropOffSpace_chain_index
LI A2 DropOffSpace_chain_space_index
JAL SetPlayerOntoChain
NOP

J triggerSound
NOP

isCurrentPlayer:
; Set the player's space to the alternate drop off space to avoid Duels.
MOVE A0 S4
LI A1 CurrentPlayerDropOffSpace_chain_index
LI A2 CurrentPlayerDropOffSpace_chain_space_index
JAL SetPlayerOntoChain
NOP

triggerSound:
LBU T6 20(T5) ; offset for p#_status_flags
ANDI T6 T6 0xFE ; mask for all except last bit, to remove backwards bit
SB T6 20(T5) ; store status flag with backwards bit removed

; Play the character's cry sound.
LBU T6 0(T5) ; load character from p#_char at T6, treated as character offset
JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 T6 0x287 ; Mario despair sound is 0x287, character offset gives other despair sounds

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; wait 30 frames

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; event triggering player index at V0
NOP
MOVE T4 V0 ; store current player index at T4

JAL GetPlayerStruct ; player struct at V0
MOVE A0 S4 ; player index at A0
MOVE T0 V0 ; store player struct at T0

LI A0 DropOffSpace_chain_index
LI A1 DropOffSpace_chain_space_index
JAL GetAbsSpaceIndexFromChainSpaceIndex ; drop off space index at V0
NOP

JAL GetSpaceData ; space data struct at V0
MOVE A0 V0 ; space index was at V0

ADDIU V0 V0 8 ; offset for X position of the space
LW T1 0(V0) ; store X pos at T1

ADDIU V0 V0 8 ; offset for Y position of the space (from X position)
LW T2 0(V0) ; store Y pos at T2

BEQ T4 S4 centered
NOP

MTC1 S5 F0 ; store incremental X position float (offset) at F0
MTC1 T1 F1 ; store space X position float to F1
SUB.S F0 F1 F0 ; subtract from offset
LI T1 0x41000000 ; float value for 8
MTC1 T1 F1 ; store right centered offset to F1
ADD.S F0 F0 F1 ; add right centered offset to the space X position
MFC1 T1 F0 ; store sum at T1

LI T3 0x41000000 ; float value for 8
MTC1 T3 F0 ; store offset at F0
MTC1 T2 F1 ; store space Y position float at F1
SUB.S F0 F1 F0 ; subtract offset to the space Y position
MFC1 T2 F0 ; store result at T2

LI T3 0x41000000 ; float value for 8
MTC1 S5 F0 ; store incremental X position float at F0
MTC1 T3 F1 ; store offset value to F1
ADD.S F0 F0 F1 ; add offset value to X position for next player
MFC1 S5 F0 ; store sum at S5

J setPosition
NOP

centered:
; Lower the Y position a bit to leave room for players already on the space.
LI T3 0x41000000 ; float value for 8
MTC1 T3 F0 ; store offset at F0
MTC1 T2 F1 ; store space Y position float at F1
Add.S F0 F1 F0 ; add offset to the space Y position
MFC1 T2 F0 ; store result at T2

setPosition:
LW V1 0x24(T0) ; load player struct data at offset 0x24 to V1
ADDIU V1 V1 0xC ; add offset of 0xC to get current player's X position
SW T1 0(V1) ; store X position into player struct

ADDIU V1 V1 8 ; add offset of 8 to get current player's Y position
SW T2 0(V1) ; store Y position into player struct

ignorePlayer:
SLTI T0 S4 3 ; is S4 < 3? (Player 1 is 0, Player 4 is 3, any greater is invalid)
BEQZ T0 exitLoopPlayers ; exit loopPlayers since all players have been iterated.
NOP

J loopPlayers
ADDIU S4 S4 1 ; iterate to next player

exitLoopPlayers: ; continue the loop
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; iterate the index of the array

; Check if index is beyond the end of the array, exit the loop if so.
SLT T0 S0 S3 ; is S0 < S3? (is the index less than the length still?)
BEQZ T0 exitLoopSpaces ; exit loopSpaces since all spaces have been iterated.
NOP

ADDIU S1 S1 2 ; iterate to next space's chain_index
ADDIU S2 S2 2 ; iterate to next space's chain_space_index

J loopSpaces ; continue the loop
NOP

exitLoopSpaces:
JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 15 ; wait 15 frames

JAL 0x8004AD50 ; Stop Sound??? Works for this at least..
ADDIU A0 R0 0x2 ; A0 needs to be 2 for it to stop the cog spinning sound???

; Fade back in.
fadeIn:
LI A0 0x04 ; Happening (?) Fade
JAL 0x80061FE8 ; InitFadeIn
LI A1 16 ; 16 frames

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; wait 17 frames

exit:
LW RA 76(SP)
LW S7 72(SP)
LW S6 68(SP)
LW S5 64(SP)
LW S4 60(SP)
LW S3 56(SP)
LW S2 52(SP)
LW S1 48(SP)
LW S0 44(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80

.align 16
ArrayChain:
.halfword WarpableSpaces_chain_indices
ArrayChainSpace:
.halfword WarpableSpaces_chain_space_indices
ArrayLength:
.halfword WarpableSpaces_length

Set Direction (Day Transition).code:
; NAME: Set Direction (Day Transition)
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space[]|ReversibleSpaces

ADDIU SP SP -80 ; Including 4 byte pad
SW RA 76(SP)
SW S7 72(SP)
SW S6 68(SP)
SW S5 64(SP)
SW S4 60(SP)
SW S3 56(SP)
SW S2 52(SP)
SW S1 48(SP)
SW S0 44(SP)

; S0 Current index of space Array
; S1 ReversibleSpaces chain_index Array
; S2 ReversibleSpaces chain_space_index Array
; S3 ReversibleSpaces Array Length
; S4 Player index
; S5 Convenience flag for Night/Day from board_ram10
; S6 ReversibleSpaces chain_index at current index
; S7 ReversibleSpaces chain_space_index at current index

; Load the board ram address with the convenience time flag at T0.
LUI T0 hi(board_ram10)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(board_ram10)
; Load the value at T1.
LBU T1 0(T0)

; Convenience Flag
; 0000 0000 Day (Dawn)
; 0001 0000 Day
; 0000 0001 Night (Dusk)
; 0001 0001 Night

; Check if it is Dawn or Dusk.
ANDI A0 T1 0x10 ; Bit indicating not a transition turn.
BNEZ A0 exit
NOP

ANDI S5 T1 0x1 ; Bit indicating Night (1) or Day (0) stored at S5.

; S1 contains the array for chain_index of each warpable space, starts at 0.
LUI S1 hi(ArrayChain)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(ArrayChain)

; S2 contains the array for chain_space_index of each warpable space, starts at 0.
LUI S2 hi(ArrayChainSpace)
ADDIU S2 S2 lo(ArrayChainSpace)

; S3 contains the length of the array.
LUI S0 hi(ArrayLength)
ADDIU S0 S0 lo(ArrayLength)
LBU S3 1(S0)

; S0 is the index to be iterated through for the space array.
ADDU S0 R0 R0 ;set to 0

;;;;;; Loop through all the warpable spaces to see if there are players present.
loopSpaces:

; S4 is used to search through each player index: [0, 1, 2, 3]
ADDU S4 R0 R0 ;set to 0

; S6 is the chain_index of the array at index S0
LBU S6 1(S1)
; S7 is the chain_space_index of the array at index S0
LBU S7 1(S2)

;;;;;; Loop through all the players.
loopPlayers:
; Set the address for p1_char under T5.
LUI T5 hi(p1_char) 
ADDIU T5 T5 lo(p1_char) ; we will use the offset from this address to get the other players

LI T6 0x38 ; load offset between player structs at T6
MULTU T6 S4 ; multiply offset by player index
NOP
MFLO T6 ; store result of multiply at T6
NOP

ADDU T5 T5 T6 ; add player offset to p#_char

; Check if the player's cur_chain_index and cur_space_index match a warpable space.
; T1 is the chain_index of the player.
ADDIU T0 T5 12 ; offset for p#_cur_chain_index from p#_char
LBU T1 0(T0)
BNE S6 T1 ignorePlayer ; ignore moving the player if the chain index is not equal.
NOP
; T2 is the chain_space_index of the player.
ADDIU T0 T5 13 ; offset for p#_cur_space_index from p#_char
LBU T2 0(T0)
BNE S7 T2 ignorePlayer ; ignore moving the player if the space index is not equal.
NOP

reversePlayer:
; Get the player's next chain index, get status and other things using an offset.
ADDIU T5 T5 14 ; offset for p#_next_chain_index from p#_char
LBU T0 0(T5) ; Get the next chain index.
LBU T1 1(T5) ; Get the next chain space index.
LBU T2 4(T5) ; Get the prev chain index.
LBU T3 5(T5) ; Get the prev chain space index.
LBU T4 6(T5) ; Get the player status flag.

; Set the player's next space to be the previous space.
SB T0 4(T5)
SB T1 5(T5)
; Set the player's previous space to be the next space.
SB T2 0(T5) 
SB T3 1(T5)

BNEZ S5 backwardsDirection ; If the bit is 1, it is Night, set to backwards.
NOP

forwardsDirection:
; Set player to be going forwards at Day.
ANDI T4 T4 0xFE ; Mask for all status bits except going backwards.
SB T4 6(T5)

J ignorePlayer
NOP

backwardsDirection:
; Set player to be going backwards at Night.
ORI T4 T4 0x1 ; Status bit for going backwards.
SB T4 6(T5)

ignorePlayer:
SLTI T0 S4 3 ; is S4 < 3? (Player 1 is 0, Player 4 is 3, any greater is invalid)
BEQZ T0 exitLoopPlayers ; exit loopPlayers since all players have been iterated.
NOP

J loopPlayers
ADDIU S4 S4 1 ; iterate to next player

exitLoopPlayers: ; continue the loop
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; iterate the index of the array

; Check if index is beyond the end of the array, exit the loop if so.
SLT T0 S0 S3 ; is S0 < S3? (is the index less than the length still?)
BEQZ T0 exitLoopSpaces ; exit loopSpaces since all spaces have been iterated.
NOP

ADDIU S1 S1 2 ; iterate to next space's chain_index
ADDIU S2 S2 2 ; iterate to next space's chain_space_index

J loopSpaces ; continue the loop
NOP

exitLoopSpaces:

exit:
LW RA 76(SP)
LW S7 72(SP)
LW S6 68(SP)
LW S5 64(SP)
LW S4 60(SP)
LW S3 56(SP)
LW S2 52(SP)
LW S1 48(SP)
LW S0 44(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80

.align 16
ArrayChain:
.halfword ReversibleSpaces_chain_indices
ArrayChainSpace:
.halfword ReversibleSpaces_chain_space_indices
ArrayLength:
.halfword ReversibleSpaces_length

One Way Transition (Start).code:
; NAME: One Way Transition (Start)
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct

ADDIU SP SP -4
SW RA 0(SP)

ADDIU A0 R0 0x0 ; Bar Fade
JAL 0x80062050 ; InitFadeOut
LI A1 16 ; 16 frames

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; wait 17 frames

LW RA 0(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 4

; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct

ADDIU SP SP -4
SW RA 0(SP)

LI A0 0x0 ; Bar Fade
JAL 0x80061FE8 ; InitFadeIn
LI A1 16 ; 16 frames

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; wait 17 frames

LW RA 0(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 4

Set Previous Space (Backwards).code:
; NAME: Set Previous Space (Backwards)
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|Prev

ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S1 32(SP)
SW S0 28(SP)

; Get the address for the current player's next space
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
SLL V1 V0 3
SUBU V1 V1 V0
SLL V0 V1 3
LUI S1 hi(p1_prev_chain_index)
ADDU S1 S1 V0
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(p1_prev_chain_index)

; Check if player landed on the space while going backwards to
; fix the issue with merging spaces setting an invalid prev space.
LBU S0 1(S1) ; get the previous chain space index
ADDIU T0 R0 0xFF ; check if space is the invalid value 
BNE S0 T0 exit ; leave if the previous space isn't invalid
NOP

; Set the previous space.
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP

ADD A0 R0 V0 ; Assigns Current Player Index to A0
ADDIU A1 R0 Prev_chain_index ; Assigns Chain Index to A1
ADDIU A2 R0 Prev_chain_space_index ; Assigns Space Index to A2

JAL SetPrevChainAndSpace 
NOP

exit:
LW RA 36(SP)
LW S1 32(SP)
LW S0 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

Display Time.code:
; NAME: Display Time
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct

ADDIU SP SP -80
SW RA 76(SP)

LUI T0 hi(0x80105703) ; most recent message ID queue?
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(0x80105703)
LBU T1 0(T0)

BNEZ T1 checkDisplay
NOP

toDisplay:
; Load the board ram address with the convenience time flag at T0.
LUI T0 hi(board_ram10)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(board_ram10)
; Load the value at T1.
LBU T1 0(T0)

; Convenience Flag
; 0000 0000 Day (Dawn)
; 0001 0000 Day
; 0000 0001 Night (Dusk)
; 0001 0001 Night

; Check if it is Night.
ANDI T0 T1 0x1 ; Bit indicating Night
BEQZ T0 isDay
NOP

isNight:
LUI A1 hi(Night)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Night)
J displayTop
NOP

isDay:
LUI A1 hi(Day)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Day)

; Following Airsola™'s implementation
displayTop:
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI T0 10 ; 10 px down
SW T0 28(SP) ; Y Coords
LI A0 -1 ; Character Image (None)
LI A2 0
JAL 0x800EC980 ; ShowMessage2 
LI A3 0

LUI T0 hi(board_ram11)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(board_ram11)
SB A0 0(T0) ; Store the ID from calling ShowMessage2.

J displayBottom
NOP

checkDisplay:
; Only way to check if our window is gone is try to create a new window...
LUI A1 hi(Dummy)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Dummy)
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI T0 10 ; 10 px down
SW T0 28(SP) ; Y Coords
LI A0 -1 ; Character Image (None)
LI A2 0
JAL 0x800EC980 ; ShowMessage2 
LI A3 0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

LUI T0 hi(0x80105703) ; most recent message ID queue?
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(0x80105703)
LBU T1 0(T0)

LUI T0 hi(board_ram11)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(board_ram11)
LBU T5 0(T0) ; load the message ID at T5

BEQ T1 T5 toDisplay
NOP

displayBottom:
; Load the board ram address that stores the time of day at T2.
LUI T2 hi(board_ram9)
ADDIU T2 T2 lo(board_ram9)
; Load the value at T3.
LBU T3 0(T2)

; Day bits
; 0000 0000 0x00   Day 1 OOO
; 0000 0001 0x01   Day 2 XOO
; 0000 0010 0x02   Day 3 XXO
; 0001 0000  0x10  Day 1 OOOO
; 0001 0001  0x11  Day 2 XOOO
; 0001 0010  0x12  Day 3 XXOO
; 0001 0011  0x13  Day 4 XXXO
; 0010 0001   0x21 Day 1 OO
; 0010 0010   0x22 Day 2 XO

; Night bits
; 0000 0011 0x03   Night 1 OOO
; 0000 0111 0x07   Night 2 XOO
; 0000 1011 0x0B   Night 3 XXO
; 0001 0111  0x17  Night 1 OO
; 0001 1011  0x1B  Night 2 XO
; 0010 0011   0x23 Night 1 OOOO
; 0010 0111   0x27 Night 2 XOOO
; 0010 1011   0x2B Night 3 XXOO
; 0010 0000   0x20 Night 4 XXXO

LI T0 0x00 ; Day 1
LUI A1 hi(Day1)
BEQ T3 T0 displayMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Day1)

LI T0 0x01 ; Day 2
LUI A1 hi(Day2)
BEQ T3 T0 displayMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Day2)

LI T0 0x02 ; Day 3
LUI A1 hi(Day3)
BEQ T3 T0 displayMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Day3)

LI T0 0x03 ; Night 1
LUI A1 hi(Night1)
BEQ T3 T0 displayMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Night1)

LI T0 0x07 ; Night 2
LUI A1 hi(Night2)
BEQ T3 T0 displayMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Night2)

LI T0 0x0B ; Night 3
LUI A1 hi(Night3)
BEQ T3 T0 displayMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Night3)

; Solstice event, extended Day

LI T0 0x10 ; Day 1 Extended
LUI A1 hi(Day1Ex)
BEQ T3 T0 displayMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Day1Ex)

LI T0 0x11 ; Day 2 Extended
LUI A1 hi(Day2Ex)
BEQ T3 T0 displayMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Day2Ex)

LI T0 0x12 ; Day 3 Extended
LUI A1 hi(Day3Ex)
BEQ T3 T0 displayMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Day3Ex)

LI T0 0x13 ; Day 4 Extended
LUI A1 hi(Day4Ex)
BEQ T3 T0 displayMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Day4Ex)

LI T0 0x17 ; Night 1 Shortened
LUI A1 hi(Night1Sh)
BEQ T3 T0 displayMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Night1Sh)

LI T0 0x1B ; Night 2 Shortened
LUI A1 hi(Night2Sh)
BEQ T3 T0 displayMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Night2Sh)

; Solstice event, extended Night

LI T0 0x21 ; Day 1 Shortened
LUI A1 hi(Day1Sh)
BEQ T3 T0 displayMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Day1Sh)

LI T0 0x22 ; Day 2 Shortened
LUI A1 hi(Day2Sh)
BEQ T3 T0 displayMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Day2Sh)

LI T0 0x23 ; Night 1 Extended
LUI A1 hi(Night1Ex)
BEQ T3 T0 displayMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Night1Ex)

LI T0 0x27 ; Night 2 Extended
LUI A1 hi(Night2Ex)
BEQ T3 T0 displayMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Night2Ex)

LI T0 0x2B ; Night 3 Extended
LUI A1 hi(Night3Ex)
BEQ T3 T0 displayMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Night3Ex)

LI T0 0x20 ; Night 4 Extended
LUI A1 hi(Night4Ex)
BEQ T3 T0 displayMessage
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Night4Ex)

displayMessage:
LUI T0 hi(board_ram11)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(board_ram11)
LBU T5 0(T0) ; load the message ID at T5

SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
MOVE A0 T5 ; get message ID from T5 
LI A2 0
JAL 0x8005B43C ; Refresh Message
LI A3 0

exit:
LW RA 76(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80

Delivery Shop.code:
; NAME: Delivery Shop
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|Shop

; Credit: Code repurposed from various shop events created by Rain and Airsola™

ADDIU SP SP -80 ; Including 4 byte pad
SW RA 76(SP)
SW S7 72(SP)
SW S6 68(SP)
SW S5 64(SP)
SW S4 60(SP)
SW S3 56(SP)
SW S2 52(SP)
SW S1 48(SP)
SW S0 44(SP)

; Load the board ram address with the convenience time flag at T0.
LUI T0 hi(board_ram10)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(board_ram10)
; Load the value at T1.
LBU T1 0(T0)

; Convenience Flag
; 0000 0000 Day (Dawn)
; 0001 0000 Day
; 0000 0001 Night (Dusk)
; 0001 0001 Night

; Check if it is Night
ANDI T1 T1 1
BNEZ T1 NoShop ; ignore if it is Night
NOP

; P4 P3 P2 P1
; 00 00 00 00 > Nothing
; 01 00 00 00 > Player 4 ordered Mushroom
; 10 00 00 11 > Player 4 ordered Skeleton Key, Player 1 ordered Warp Block
LUI S6 hi(board_ram12) ; board_ram12 has the current delivery item of each player
ADDIU S6 S6 lo(board_ram12)

; P4 P3 P2 P1
; 00 00 00 00 > Nothing
; 01 00 00 00 > Player 4 has 1 delivery left
; 10 00 00 01 > Player 4 has 2 deliveries left, Player 1 has 1 delivery left
LUI S7 hi(board_ram13) ; board_ram13 has the current delivery status of each player
ADDIU S7 S7 lo(board_ram13)


JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
ADD S3 V0 R0 ; move V0 to S3
ADD A0 V0 R0 ; move V0 to A0
LI A1 -1 ; animation to set, idle
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0x02 ; looping

LUI A0 hi(Shop_chain_index)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(Shop_chain_index)
LUI A1 hi(Shop_chain_space_index)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Shop_chain_space_index)
JAL GetAbsSpaceIndexFromChainSpaceIndex
NOP

ADDU A2 R0 V0 ; stores space index for the Shop
; Rotate player model to face down.
ADDU A0 R0 S3 ; move player index to A0 again
ADDIU A1 R0 12 ; 12 frames
JAL RotatePlayerModel
NOP

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 13 ; wait 13 frames

LBU S4 0(S6) ; load board_ram12
SRLV S4 S4 S3 ; shift bits right by player index
SRLV S4 S4 S3 ; doubling down
ANDI S4 S4 0x3 ; only get first two bits, store at S4

LBU S5 0(S7) ; load board_ram13
SRLV S5 S5 S3 ; shift bits right by player index
SRLV S5 S5 S3 ; doubling down
ANDI S5 S5 0x3 ; only get first two bits, store at S5

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x2A3 ; Snifit sound

BNEZ S5 AlreadyOrdered
NOP

LI A0 0x1D ; Character image (Snifit)
LUI A1 hi(Greetings)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Greetings)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
SW R0 0x0010 (SP)
SW R0 0x0014 (SP)
SW R0 0x0018 (SP)
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

ORI A0 R0 0x0002
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
ORI A1 R0 0x0000 ; AI says yes
MOVE S0 V0 ; move V0 to S0
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP
MOVE V0 S0 ; move S0 back to V0 (index chosen)
BNEZ V0 close
NOP

MOVE A0 S3 ; move player index to A0
LI A1 10 ; minimum coin value required
JAL PlayerHasCoins
NOP

BEQZ V0 TooPoor ; V0 has 0 if player cannot afford
NOP

Shop:
LI A0 0x1D ; Character image (Snifit)
LUI A1 hi(OpenShop)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(OpenShop)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
SW R0 0x0010 (SP)
SW R0 0x0014 (SP)
SW R0 0x0018 (SP)
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

ORI A0 R0 0x0002
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
ORI A1 R0 0x0000 ; AI always picks Mushroom, safest bet
MOVE S0 V0 ; move V0 to S0
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP
LI T0 0x03 ; View Map index
BEQ S0 T0 ViewMap
NOP
LI T0 0x04 ; leave index
BEQ S0 T0 close
NOP

; Otherwise S0 is the index of the item.
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; adjust starting index to be 1 instead of 0
ADDU S4 S4 S0 ; add to S4
SLLV S4 S4 S3 ; shift bits left by player index
SLLV S4 S4 S3 ; doubling down
LBU T1 0(S6) ; restore other players
OR S4 S4 T1 ; store flag addition
SB S4 0(S6)

ADDIU S5 S5 2 ; set to be 2 turns
SLLV S5 S5 S3 ; shift bits left by player index
SLLV S5 S5 S3 ; doubling down
LBU T1 0(S7) ; restore other players
OR S5 S5 T1 ; store flag addition
SB S5 0(S7)

DidBuy:
MOVE A0 S3 ; Current Player's Index
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
LI A1 -10 ; Amount of Coins to lose

MOVE A0 S3 ; Current Player's Index
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
LI A1 -10 ; Amount of Coins to show

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Sleep 30 frames to wait for coins

LI A0 0x1D ; Character image (Snifit)
LUI A1 hi(CloseDeal)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(CloseDeal)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
SW R0, 0x0010 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0014 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0018 (SP)
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

J close
NOP

ViewMap:
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J Shop
NOP

AlreadyOrdered:
LI A0 0x1D ; Character image (Snifit)
LUI A1 hi(GreetingsAlready)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(GreetingsAlready)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
SW R0, 0x0010 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0014 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0018 (SP)
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

; Give bonus based on item ordered.
LI S0 2 ; Bonus for ordering Mushroom.
LI T1 1 ; Mushroom index
BEQ T1 S4 BonusGift
NOP

LI S0 5 ; Bonus for ordering Skeleton Key.
LI T1 2 ; Skeleton Key index
BEQ T1 S4 BonusGift
NOP

LI S0 3 ; Bonus for ordering Warp Block.

BonusGift:
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
MOVE S4 V0

MOVE A0 S4 ; Current Player's Index
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
MOVE A1 S0 ; Amount of Coins to gain

MOVE A0 S4 ; Current Player's Index
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
MOVE A1 S0 ; Amount of Coins to show

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Sleep 30 frames to wait for coins

J close
NOP

TooPoor:
LI A0 0x1D ; Character image (Snifit)
LUI A1 hi(PlayerTooPoor)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(PlayerTooPoor)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
SW R0, 0x0010 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0014 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0018 (SP)
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

close:

LI A0 0x1D ; Character image (Snifit)
LUI A1 hi(Dismiss)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Dismiss)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
SW R0, 0x0010 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0014 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0018 (SP)
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

J exit
NOP

NoShop:
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
ADD S3 V0 R0 ; move V0 to S3
ADD A0 V0 R0 ; move V0 to A0
LI A1 -1 ; animation to set, idle
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0x02 ; looping

LUI A1 hi(NightShop)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(NightShop)
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
ADDI A0 R0 -1 ; Character image (-1 for none)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

exit:
LW RA 76(SP)
LW S7 72(SP)
LW S6 68(SP)
LW S5 64(SP)
LW S4 60(SP)
LW S3 56(SP)
LW S2 52(SP)
LW S1 48(SP)
LW S0 44(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80

Morning Delivery.code:
; NAME: Morning Delivery
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct

; Credit: Code repurposed from various shop events created by Rain and Airsola™

ADDIU SP SP -80 ; Including 4 byte pad
SW RA 76(SP)
SW S7 72(SP)
SW S6 68(SP)
SW S5 64(SP)
SW S4 60(SP)
SW S3 56(SP)
SW S2 52(SP)
SW S1 48(SP)
SW S0 44(SP)

; Load the board ram address with the convenience time flag at T0.
LUI T0 hi(board_ram10)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(board_ram10)
; Load the value at T1.
LBU T1 0(T0)

; Convenience Flag
; 0000 0000 Day (Dawn)
; 0001 0000 Day
; 0000 0001 Night (Dusk)
; 0001 0001 Night

; Check if it is Day (Dawn) which is all 0
BNEZ T1 exit
NOP

; P4 P3 P2 P1
; 00 00 00 00 > Nothing
; 01 00 00 00 > Player 4 ordered Mushroom
; 10 00 00 11 > Player 4 ordered Skeleton Key, Player 1 ordered Warp Block
LUI S6 hi(board_ram12) ; board_ram12 has the current delivery item of each player
ADDIU S6 S6 lo(board_ram12)

; P4 P3 P2 P1
; 00 00 00 00 > Nothing
; 01 00 00 00 > Player 4 has 1 delivery left
; 10 00 00 01 > Player 4 has 2 deliveries left, Player 1 has 1 delivery left
LUI S7 hi(board_ram13) ; board_ram13 has the current delivery status of each player
ADDIU S7 S7 lo(board_ram13)

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
ADD S3 V0 R0 ; move V0 to S3

LBU S4 0(S6) ; load board_ram12
SRLV S4 S4 S3 ; shift bits right by player index
SRLV S4 S4 S3 ; doubling down
ANDI S4 S4 0x3 ; only get first two bits, store at S4

BEQZ S4 exit ; ignore player if they have not ordered anything
NOP

LUI S1 hi(ModelPointer)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(ModelPointer) ; load the null pointer for the Snufit

; Load Snufit Model
LUI A0 0x000A ; 0x000A0000, model directory 10
ORI A0 A0 0x012F ; 0x000A012F, Snufit model
LI A1 8 ; No shadow model?
LI A2 1063675494 ; 0.9f float
LI A3 1061997773 ; 0.8f float
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
JAL 0x800D912C ; LoadGlobalModel
NOP

MOVE S0 V0 ; Load Model Data into S0
SW V0 0(S1) ; Store Model Data

LUI T5 hi(p1_cur_chain_index) 
ADDIU T5 T5 lo(p1_cur_chain_index)

LI T6 0x38 ; load offset between player structs at T6
MULTU T6 S3 ; multiply offset by player index
NOP
MFLO T6 ; store result of multiply at T6
NOP

ADDU T5 T5 T6 ; add player offset to p#_cur_chain_index
LBU A0 0(T5) ; cur_chain_index
LBU A1 1(T5) ; cur_chain_space_index
JAL GetAbsSpaceIndexFromChainSpaceIndex
NOP
MOVE A0 V0
JAL GetSpaceData 
NOP

MOVE A1 V0
ADDIU A1 A1 8
MOVE A0 S0
ADDIU A0 A0 12
JAL 0x80089A20 ; loads model onto current space
NOP

LI T1 0x3F000000 ; float value for 0.5
SW T1 0x24(S0) ; X size
SW T1 0x28(S0) ; Y size
SW T1 0x2C(S0) ; Z size

LI T1 0x42DC0000 ; float value for 110
SW T1 16(S0) ; set Z coordinates for model

LI S5 0 ; index for loop

;;;;;;;;; start loop
descentLoop:
LI T2 0x3fA00000 ; float value for 1.25
LW T3 16(S0)
MTC1 T2 F0 ; store incremental Z position float at F0
MTC1 T3 F1 ; store offset value to F1
SUB.S F0 F1 F0 ; subtract offset value to Z position
MFC1 T2 F0 ; store total at T2
SW T2 16(S0) ; set Z coordinates for model

JAL SleepVProcess ; wait 1 frame
NOP

ADDIU S5 S5 1 ; iterate loop
LI T1 70 ; 70 frames
BNE S5 T1 descentLoop
NOP

;;;;;;;;; end loop

LBU S5 0(S7) ; load board_ram13
SRLV S5 S5 S3 ; shift bits right by player index
SRLV S5 S5 S3 ; doubling down
ANDI S5 S5 0x3 ; only get first two bits, store at S5

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x2A3 ; Snifit sound

LI A0 0x09 ; Character image (Snufit)

LI S0 0x00 ; Mushroom is 0x00
LI V0 1 ; Mushroom
BEQ S4 V0 Mushroom
NOP

LI S0 0x01 ; Skeleton Key is 0x01
LI V0 2 ; Skeleton Key
BEQ S4 V0 SkeletonKey
NOP

LI S0 0x05 ; Warp Block is 0x05
LI V0 3 ; Warp Block
BEQ S4 V0 WarpBlock
NOP

Mushroom:
LUI A1 hi(DeliverMushroom)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(DeliverMushroom)
J ContinueMessage
NOP

SkeletonKey:
LUI A1 hi(DeliverSkeletonKey)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(DeliverSkeletonKey)
J ContinueMessage
NOP

WarpBlock:
LUI A1 hi(DeliverWarpBlock)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(DeliverWarpBlock)

ContinueMessage:
ADDU A2 R0 R0
SW R0, 0x0010 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0014 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0018 (SP)
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

MOVE A0 S3 ; player index
JAL PlayerHasEmptyItemSlot ; returns the empty item slot index in V0
NOP

MOVE T5 V0 ; move item slot index in T5
LI V0 -1 ; -1 means there is no empty slot
BEQ T5 V0 FullInventory ; no item given for full inventory, we warned you
NOP

LUI T2 hi(p1_item1)
ADDIU T2 T2 lo(p1_item1) ; load location of item1
ADDU T2 T2 T5 ; offset by item slot index

LI T3 0x38 ; load offset between player structs at T3
MULTU T3 S3 ; multiply offset by player index
NOP
MFLO T3 ; store result of multiply at T3
NOP

ADDU T3 T2 T3 ; add player offset

SB S0 0(T3) ; store item at offset

; Set up for later.
LI S2 3 ; set S2 to 0000 0011
SLLV S2 S2 S3 ; shift bits left by player index
SLLV S2 S2 S3 ; doubling down
XORI S2 S2 0xFF ; swap all bits so 00 is for our player 

LI V0 1
BEQ S5 V0 LastDelivery ; last item to deliver
NOP

LI A0 0x09 ; Character image (Snufit)
LUI A1 hi(FirstDelivery)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(FirstDelivery)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
SW R0, 0x0010 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0014 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0018 (SP)
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

J IterateCount
NOP

LastDelivery:
LI A0 0x09 ; Character image (Snufit)
LUI A1 hi(SecondDelivery)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(SecondDelivery)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
SW R0, 0x0010 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0014 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0018 (SP)
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

LBU T1 0(S6) ; restore other players
AND S4 S2 T1 ; store flag erase
SB S4 0(S6)

IterateCount:

ADDI S5 S5 -1 ; iterate delivery count down
SLLV S5 S5 S3 ; shift bits left by player index
SLLV S5 S5 S3 ; doubling down
LBU T1 0(S7) ; restore other players
AND T1 T1 S2 ; erase flag for our player
OR S5 S5 T1 ; store flag change
SB S5 0(S7)

J close
NOP

FullInventory:
LI A0 0x09 ; Character image (Snufit)
LUI A1 hi(NoDelivery)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(NoDelivery)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
SW R0, 0x0010 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0014 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0018 (SP)
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

close:

LI A0 0x09 ; Character image (Snufit)
LUI A1 hi(Dismiss)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Dismiss)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
SW R0, 0x0010 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0014 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0018 (SP)
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

LW S0 0(S1) ; Load Model data back on S0
LI S5 0 ; reset counter

ascentLoop:
LI T2 0x3fA00000 ; float value for 1.25
LW T3 16(S0)
MTC1 T2 F0 ; store incremental Z position float at F0
MTC1 T3 F1 ; store offset value to F1
ADD.S F0 F0 F1 ; add offset value to Z position
MFC1 T2 F0 ; store sum at T2
SW T2 16(S0) ; set Z coordinates for model

JAL SleepVProcess ; wait 1 frame
NOP

ADDIU S5 S5 1 ; iterate loop
LI T1 70 ; 70 frames
BNE S5 T1 ascentLoop
NOP

SW R0 0(S1) ; Overwrite back to zero
JAL 0x800D9B54 ; RemoveModel
MOVE A0 S0 ; Pass model pointer on A0

exit:
LW RA 76(SP)
LW S7 72(SP)
LW S6 68(SP)
LW S5 64(SP)
LW S4 60(SP)
LW S3 56(SP)
LW S2 52(SP)
LW S1 48(SP)
LW S0 44(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80

Tick Tock Spinner.code:
; NAME: Tick Tock Spinner
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|ModelSpace
; PARAM: Space|HappeningSpace

; Credit: Code repurposed from various model events by MarioComix

ADDIU SP SP -80 ; Including 4 byte pad
SW RA 76(SP)
SW S7 72(SP)
SW S6 68(SP)
SW S5 64(SP)
SW S4 60(SP)
SW S3 56(SP)
SW S2 52(SP)
SW S1 48(SP)
SW S0 44(SP)

; S0 Player Button Input Address (Time of Day Flag (0 if Day, 1 if Night))
; S1 Clock Hand Model Data
; S2 Clock Hand Model Pointer
; S3 Base Model Pointer (Clock Base Model Data)
; S4 Clock Base Model Pointer
; S5 Counter (Player Index)
; S6 Rotation (Base Model Data)
; S7 Difficulty (Base Model Pointer)

; Fade out then load all the models.
fadeOut:
ADDIU A0 R0 0x04 ; Happening (?) Fade
JAL 0x80062050 ; InitFadeOut
LI A1 16 ; 16 frames

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; wait 17 frames

; Load the board ram address with the convenience time flag at T0.
LUI T0 hi(board_ram10)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(board_ram10)
; Load the value at T1.
LBU T1 0(T0)

; Convenience Flag
; 0000 0000 Day (Dawn)
; 0001 0000 Day
; 0000 0001 Night (Dusk)
; 0001 0001 Night

ANDI S0 T1 0x01 ; store first bit (0 Day, 1 Night) at S0
XORI S0 S0 0x01 ; swap bit to be (1 Day, 0 Night) since it is easier to handle

LUI S2 hi(ClockHandPointer)
ADDIU S2 S2 lo(ClockHandPointer) ; load the null pointer for the clock hand

LUI A0 0x005A ; 0x005A0000, model directory 90
ORI A0 A0 0x0000 ; 0x005A0000, blue clock hand from Tick Tock Hop
ADDU A0 A0 S0; add the bit for Day/Night since 0000 is blue, 0001 is brown
LI A1 9 ; Shadow model
LI A2 1063675494 ; 0.9f float
LI A3 1061997773 ; 0.8f float
JAL 0x800D912C ; LoadGlobalModel
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4

MOVE S1 V0 ; Load Model Data into S1
SW V0 0(S2) ; Store Model Data

LUI S4 hi(ClockBasePointer)
ADDIU S4 S4 lo(ClockBasePointer) ; load the null pointer for the clock base

LUI A0 0x005A ; 0x005A0000, model directory 90
ORI A0 A0 0x0002 ; 0x005A0002, the centerpiece of the clock from Tick Tock Hop
LI A1 9 ; Shadow model
LI A2 1063675494 ; 0.9f float
LI A3 1061997773 ; 0.8f float
JAL 0x800D912C ; LoadGlobalModel
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4

MOVE S3 V0 ; Load Model Data into S3
SW V0 0(S4) ; Store Model Data

LUI S7 hi(BasePointer)
ADDIU S7 S7 lo(BasePointer) ; load the null pointer for the base

LUI A0 0x005A ; 0x005A0000, model directory 90
ORI A0 A0 0x0003 ; 0x005A0003, the base of the clock from Tick Tock Hop
LI A1 9 ; Shadow model
LI A2 1063675494 ; 0.9f float
LI A3 1061997773 ; 0.8f float
JAL 0x800D912C ; LoadGlobalModel
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4

MOVE S6 V0 ; Load Model Data into S6
SW V0 0(S7) ; Store Model Data

;===GET MODEL SPACE DATA===
LI A0 ModelSpace
JAL GetSpaceData ; Get space data for the space the model stands on
NOP
MOVE S0 V0

;===PUT MODEL ON SPACE===
MOVE A1 S0
ADDIU A1 A1 8
MOVE A0 S1
ADDIU A0 A0 12
JAL 0x80089A20 ; loads clock hand model onto ModelSpace
NOP

MOVE A1 S0
ADDIU A1 A1 8
MOVE A0 S3
ADDIU A0 A0 12
JAL 0x80089A20 ; loads clock base model onto ModelSpace
NOP

MOVE A1 S0
ADDIU A1 A1 8
MOVE A0 S6
ADDIU A0 A0 12
JAL 0x80089A20 ; loads base model onto ModelSpace
NOP

LI T1 0x3F000000 ; float value for 0.5
SW T1 16(S3) ; set Z coordinates for clock base to be slightly above the hand

LI T1 0xC0400000 ; float value for -3
SW T1 16(S6) ; set Z coordinates for base to be slightly below the hand

MOVE S3 S7 ; move Base Model Pointer to S3 to save on registers

; Load player on top of clock hands.
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; event triggering player index at V0
NOP
MOVE S5 V0 ; store current player index at S5

JAL GetPlayerStruct ; player struct at V0
MOVE A0 S5 ; player index at A0
MOVE T0 V0 ; store player struct at T0

LI A0 ModelSpace_chain_index
LI A1 ModelSpace_chain_space_index
JAL GetAbsSpaceIndexFromChainSpaceIndex ; actual space index at V0
NOP

JAL GetSpaceData ; space data struct at V0
MOVE A0 V0 ; space index was at V0

ADDIU V0 V0 8 ; offset for X position of the space
LW T1 0(V0) ; store X pos at T1

ADDIU V0 V0 8 ; offset for Y position of the space (from X position)
LW T2 0(V0) ; store Y pos at T2

LW V1 0x24(T0) ; load player struct data at offset 0x24 to V1
ADDIU V1 V1 0xC ; add offset of 0xC to get current player's X position
SW T1 0(V1) ; store X position into player struct

ADDIU V1 V1 8 ; add offset of 8 to get current player's Y position
SW T2 0(V1) ; store Y position into player struct

ADDIU V1 V1 8 ; add offset of 8 to get current player's Z position
LI T3 0x41000000 ; float value for 8
SW T3 0(V1) ; set Z value to be above clock hands

LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 1 ; rotate for 1 frame...
JAL RotatePlayerModel
LI A2 ModelSpace

; Fade back in.
fadeIn:
LI A0 0x04 ; Happening (?) Fade
JAL 0x80061FE8 ; InitFadeIn
LI A1 16 ; 16 frames

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; wait 17 frames

MOVE A0 S5 
JAL GetPlayerPlacement
NOP

; player is in first, hardest speed
BEQZ V0 setupGame
LI S7 -24

LI T0 3 ; player is in last, easiest speed
BEQ V0 T0 setupGame
LI S7 -6

LI S7 -12 ; player is 2nd or 3rd, normal speed

setupGame:
JAL PlayerIsCPU ; Returns 1 if the current player is a CPU
MOVE A0 S5

BNEZ V0 cpuSetup ; if player is CPU we cannot use real controller input
NOP

MOVE A0 S5 ; set current player at A0
; Get the Controller for actual Input
LUI T1 hi(p1_controller)
ADDIU T1 T1 lo(p1_controller) ; Load P1's Controller
LI T0 0x38 ; This is the distance between each player's Controller
MULT A0 T0 ;  Multiply Current Player Index by T0
NOP
MFLO T0 ; Move the result to T0
NOP

ADDU T1 T1 T0 ; Add result to get Current Player's Controller Addr
LBU T0 0(T1) ; Load address value into T0

LUI S0 hi(0x800C9520)
ADDIU S0 S0 lo(0x800C9520) ; Load P1's Button Press Address
LI A2 0x2 ; This is the distance between each player's Button Address
MULT A2 T0 ;  Multiply Controller value by 2
MFLO T0 ; Move the result to T0

ADDU S0 S0 T0 ; Add result to get Current Player's Button Press Address

J continueSetup
NOP

cpuSetup:
JAL GetRandomByte ; random 0-255 byte at V0?
NOP

LI T0 0x80 ; divide by 128
DIVU V0 T0
NOP
MFHI T0
NOP

MOVE V0 S0
LUI S0 hi(board_ram14)
ADDIU S0 S0 lo(board_ram14) ; store address to be looked at for fake input
SB T0 0(S0) ; set to random number

continueSetup:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x2A8 ; Tumble hi sound

LI A0 0x15 ; Character image (Tumble)
LUI A1 hi(Intro)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Intro)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
SW R0, 0x0010 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0014 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0018 (SP)
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

LI S6 360 ; 360 degrees to start (same as 0)
LI S5 0 ; counter

LUI A1 hi(ButtonPrompt)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(ButtonPrompt)
SW R0 16(SP) ; A4
SW R0 20(SP) ; A5
SW R0 24(SP) ; A6
LI T0 170 ; 170 px down
SW T0 28(SP) ; Y Coords
LI A0 -1 ; Character Image (None)
LI A2 0
JAL 0x800EC980 ; ShowMessage2 
LI A3 0

JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 R0 0x4BB ; Click sound

JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 R0 0x4BC ; Ticking sound

accelerate:
ADDU A0 R0 S1 ; clock hand model pointer to a0
JAL setModelRotation
MOVE A1 S6 ; set degrees

SLTI T0 S5 9 ; counter less than 9?
BNEZ T0 iterate
LI T1 -1 ; 1 degrees

SLTI T0 S5 15 ; counter less than 15?
BNEZ T0 iterate
LI T1 -2 ; 2 degrees

SLTI T0 S5 18 ; counter less than 18?
BNEZ T0 iterate
LI T1 -3 ; 3 degrees

SLTI T0 S5 21 ; counter less than 21?
BNEZ T0 iterate
LI T1 -6 ; 6 degrees

SLTI T0 S5 23 ; counter less than 23?
BNEZ T0 iterate
LI T1 -12 ; 12 degrees

LI T1 -24 ; 24 degrees

iterate:
BEQ T1 S7 startSpin ; leave loop if we reach top velocity
NOP
ADDU S6 S6 T1 ; subtract by # degrees each frame
ADDIU S5 S5 1 ; iterate by 1

JAL SleepVProcess ; wait 1 frame
NOP

J accelerate
NOP

startSpin:

;;;;;;;; Start Spin Loop
spinLoop:
BNEZ S6 setAngle 
NOP

LI S6 360 ; reset to 360

setAngle:
ADDU A0 R0 S1 ; clock hand model pointer to a0
JAL setModelRotation
MOVE A1 S6 ; set degrees

ADDU S6 S6 S7 ; subtract by # degrees each frame based on difficulty

; CPU Logic
SLTI T0 S6 120 ; is S6 less than 120?
LI T1 330 
SLT T1 T1 S6 ; is S6 greater than 330?
OR T0 T0 T1 ; both conditions
BEQZ T0 continueSpin
NOP 
LUI T0 hi(board_ram14)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(board_ram14) ; store address to be looked at for fake input
LBU T1 0(T0)
ADDIU T1 T1 1 ; iterate by 1 each frame
SB T1 0(T0)

continueSpin:
LBU T0 0(S0) ; load input
LI T1 0x80 ; A press
BEQ T0 T1 pressedA ; leave if A has been pressed
NOP

JAL SleepVProcess ; wait 1 frame
NOP

; loops every 60 frames
J spinLoop
NOP

;;;;;;;; End Loop

pressedA:
JAL PlaySound
ADDIU A0 R0 0x4BB ; Click sound

decelerate:
ADDU A0 R0 S1 ; clock hand model pointer to a0
JAL setModelRotation
MOVE A1 S6 ; set degrees

SLTI T0 S5 9 ; counter less than 9?
BNEZ T0 iterateD
LI T1 -1 ; 1 degrees

SLTI T0 S5 15 ; counter less than 15?
BNEZ T0 iterateD
LI T1 -2 ; 2 degrees

SLTI T0 S5 18 ; counter less than 18?
BNEZ T0 iterateD
LI T1 -3 ; 3 degrees

SLTI T0 S5 21 ; counter less than 21?
BNEZ T0 iterateD
LI T1 -6 ; 6 degrees

SLTI T0 S5 23 ; counter less than 23?
BNEZ T0 iterateD
LI T1 -12 ; 12 degrees

LI T1 -24 ; 24 degrees

iterateD:
BEQZ S5 endGame ; leave loop if we reach 0 velocity
NOP
ADDU S6 S6 T1 ; subtract by # degrees each frame
ADDI S5 S5 -1 ; iterate by -1

JAL SleepVProcess ; wait 1 frame
NOP

J decelerate
NOP

endGame:
JAL 0x8004AD50 ; Stop Sound??? Works for this at least..
ADDIU A0 R0 0xC ; A0 needs to be 12 for it to stop the ticking sound???

; Close A Button prompt message.
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

; Load the board ram address with the convenience time flag at T0.
LUI T0 hi(board_ram10)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(board_ram10)
; Load the value at T1.
LBU T1 0(T0)

; Convenience Flag
; 0000 0000 Day (Dawn)
; 0001 0000 Day
; 0000 0001 Night (Dusk)
; 0001 0001 Night

ANDI S0 T1 0x01 ; store first bit (0 Day, 1 Night) at S0

; Load Player Index back at S5.
JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; event triggering player index at V0
NOP
MOVE S5 V0 ; store current player index at S5

SLTI T0 S6 0 ; is the rotation negative after decelerate?
BEQZ T0 noCorrection
NOP

ADDI S6 S6 360 ; add 360 to it

noCorrection:
; Left Panel
SLTI T0 S6 331 ; is S6 less than 330?
LI T1 269 
SLT T1 T1 S6 ; is S6 greater than 370?
AND T0 T0 T1 ; both conditions
BNEZ T0 leftReward
NOP 

; Right Panel
SLTI T0 S6 91 ; is S6 less than 90?
LI T1 29
SLT T1 T1 S6 ; is S6 greater than 30?
AND T0 T0 T1 ; both conditions
BNEZ T0 rightReward
NOP 

; Middle Panel
SLTI T0 S6 30 ; is S6 less than 30?
LI T1 330
SLT T1 T1 S6 ; is S6 greater than 330?
OR T0 T0 T1 ; both conditions
BNEZ T0 middleReward
NOP

; Empty
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x2A9 ; Tumble disappointment sound

LI A0 0x15 ; Character image (Tumble)
LUI A1 hi(Failure)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Failure)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
SW R0, 0x0010 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0014 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0018 (SP)
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

J fadeOut
NOP

leftReward:
LI S6 10 ; 10 coins
BEQZ S0 coinsReward
NOP

LI S7 0x3 ; Reverse Mushroom
LI S6 5 ; 5 coins

MOVE A0 S5 ; player index
JAL PlayerHasEmptyItemSlot ; returns the empty item slot index in V0
NOP

MOVE T5 V0 ; move item slot index in T5
LI V0 -1 ; -1 means there is no empty slot
BEQ T5 V0 fullInventory ; give coins instead for full inventory
NOP

MOVE S6 T5 ; store slot offset instead

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x2A7 ; Tumble joy sound

LI A0 0x15 ; Character image (Tumble)
LUI A1 hi(LeftItem)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(LeftItem)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
SW R0, 0x0010 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0014 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0018 (SP)
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

J giveItem
NOP

rightReward:
LI S6 15 ; 15 coins
BEQZ S0 coinsReward
NOP

LI S7 0xA ; Golden Mushroom
LI S6 10 ; 10 coins

MOVE A0 S5 ; player index
JAL PlayerHasEmptyItemSlot ; returns the empty item slot index in V0
NOP

MOVE T5 V0 ; move item slot index in T5
LI V0 -1 ; -1 means there is no empty slot
BEQ T5 V0 fullInventory ; give coins instead for full inventory
NOP

MOVE S6 T5 ; store slot offset instead

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x2A7 ; Tumble joy sound

LI A0 0x15 ; Character image (Tumble)
LUI A1 hi(RightItem)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(RightItem)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
SW R0, 0x0010 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0014 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0018 (SP)
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

J giveItem
NOP

middleReward:
LI S6 5 ; 5 coins
BEQZ S0 coinsReward
NOP

LI S7 0x1 ; Skeleton Key
LI S6 5 ; 5 coins

MOVE A0 S5 ; player index
JAL PlayerHasEmptyItemSlot ; returns the empty item slot index in V0
NOP

MOVE T5 V0 ; move item slot index in T5
LI V0 -1 ; -1 means there is no empty slot
BEQ T5 V0 fullInventory ; give coins instead for full inventory
NOP

MOVE S6 T5 ; store slot offset instead

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x2A7 ; Tumble joy sound

LI A0 0x15 ; Character image (Tumble)
LUI A1 hi(MiddleItem)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(MiddleItem)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
SW R0, 0x0010 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0014 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0018 (SP)
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

giveItem:
LUI T2 hi(p1_item1)
ADDIU T2 T2 lo(p1_item1) ; load location of item1
ADDU T2 T2 S6 ; offset by item slot index

LI T3 0x38 ; load offset between player structs at T3
MULTU T3 S5 ; multiply offset by player index
NOP
MFLO T3 ; store result of multiply at T3
NOP

ADDU T3 T2 T3 ; add player offset

SB S7 0(T3) ; store item at offset

J fadeOut
NOP

fullInventory:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x2A6 ; Tumble ok sound

LI A0 0x15 ; Character image (Tumble)
LUI A1 hi(InventoryFull)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(InventoryFull)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
SW R0, 0x0010 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0014 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0018 (SP)
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

MOVE A0 S5 ; Current Player's Index
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
MOVE A1 S6 ; Amount of Coins to gain

MOVE A0 S5 ; Current Player's Index
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
MOVE A1 S6 ; Amount of Coins to show

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Sleep 30 frames to wait for coins

J fadeOut
NOP

coinsReward:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x2A7 ; Tumble joy sound

LI A0 0x15 ; Character image (Tumble)
LUI A1 hi(GainCoins)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(GainCoins)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
SW R0, 0x0010 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0014 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0018 (SP)
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

MOVE A0 S5 ; Current Player's Index
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
MOVE A1 S6 ; Amount of Coins to gain

MOVE A0 S5 ; Current Player's Index
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
MOVE A1 S6 ; Amount of Coins to show

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Sleep 30 frames to wait for coins

; Fade out then unload all the models.
fadeOut:
ADDIU A0 R0 0x04 ; Happening (?) Fade
JAL 0x80062050 ; InitFadeOut
LI A1 16 ; 16 frames

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; wait 17 frames

SW R0 0(S2) ; Overwrite back to zero
JAL 0x800D9B54 ; RemoveModel
MOVE A0 S1 ; Pass model pointer on A0

LW S1 0(S4) 
SW R0 0(S4) ; Overwrite back to zero
JAL 0x800D9B54 ; RemoveModel
MOVE A0 S1 ; Pass model pointer on A0

LW S1 0(S3)
SW R0 0(S3) ; Overwrite back to zero
JAL 0x800D9B54 ; RemoveModel
MOVE A0 S1 ; Pass model pointer on A0

; Load player back on the triggering Happening Space.
JAL GetPlayerStruct ; player struct at V0
MOVE A0 S5 ; player index at A0
MOVE T0 V0 ; store player struct at T0

LI A0 HappeningSpace_chain_index
LI A1 HappeningSpace_chain_space_index
JAL GetAbsSpaceIndexFromChainSpaceIndex ; actual space index at V0
NOP

JAL GetSpaceData ; space data struct at V0
MOVE A0 V0 ; space index was at V0

ADDIU V0 V0 8 ; offset for X position of the space
LW T1 0(V0) ; store X pos at T1

ADDIU V0 V0 8 ; offset for Y position of the space (from X position)
LW T2 0(V0) ; store Y pos at T2

LW V1 0x24(T0) ; load player struct data at offset 0x24 to V1
ADDIU V1 V1 0xC ; add offset of 0xC to get current player's X position
SW T1 0(V1) ; store X position into player struct

ADDIU V1 V1 8 ; add offset of 8 to get current player's Y position
SW T2 0(V1) ; store Y position into player struct

ADDIU V1 V1 8 ; add offset of 8 to get current player's Z position
LI T3 0x0 ; float value for 0
SW T3 0(V1) ; set Z value to be on the space

; Fade back in.
fadeIn:
LI A0 0x04 ; Happening (?) Fade
JAL 0x80061FE8 ; InitFadeIn
LI A1 16 ; 16 frames

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; wait 17 frames

J exit
NOP

exit:
LW RA 76(SP)
LW S7 72(SP)
LW S6 68(SP)
LW S5 64(SP)
LW S4 60(SP)
LW S3 56(SP)
LW S2 52(SP)
LW S1 48(SP)
LW S0 44(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80

; Rain's model function
setModelRotation:
ADDIU sp, sp, -0x40
SW ra, 0x0018 (sp)
SW s0, 0x001C (sp)
SW s1, 0x0020 (sp)
SW s2, 0x0024 (sp)
SW s3, 0x0028 (sp)
SWC1 f20, 0x0030 (sp)
SWC1 f22, 0x0034 (sp)
SWC1 f24, 0x0038 (sp)
SWC1 f26, 0x003C (sp)
LUI a2, 0x0000 //always 0
LUI a3, 0x3F80 //always 1
ADDU s0, a0, r0 //modelPtr to s0
//
MTC1 a1, f0
LI t0, 0x3c8f5c29
MTC1 t0, f12
CVT.S.W f0, f0
MUL.S f0, f0, f12 //convert to radians
MFC1 s1, f0 //currentAngle to s1
//
ADDU s2, a2, r0 //move x1 to s2
ADDU s3, a3, r0 //move y1 to s3
/////////////////////////////////////////
JAL cosf
MTC1 s1, f12 //angle to f12
MOV.S f20, f0 //cosf(currentAngle) on f20

JAL sinf
MTC1 s1, f12 //angle to f12
MOV.S f22, f0 //sinf(currentAngle) on f22

MTC1 s2, f24 //x1 on f24
MTC1 s3, f26 //y1 on f26

//x1 * cosF(currentAngle)
MUL.S f0, f24, f20

//y1 * sinF(currentAngle)
MUL.S f2, f26, f22

//x2 =
SUB.S f0, f0, f2

//x1 * sinF(currentAngle)
MUL.S f2, f24, f22

//y1 * cosF(currentAngle);
MUL.S f4, f26, f20

//y2 =
ADD.S f2, f2, f4

//flip x
NEG.S f0, f0

SWC1 f0, 0x0018 (s0) //store x2
SWC1 f2, 0x0020 (s0) //store y2

LW ra, 0x0018 (sp)
LW s0, 0x001C (sp)
LW s1, 0x0020 (sp)
LW s2, 0x0024 (sp)
LW s3, 0x0028 (sp)
LWC1 f20, 0x0030 (sp)
LWC1 f22, 0x0034 (sp)
LWC1 f24, 0x0038 (sp)
LWC1 f26, 0x003C (sp)
JR RA
ADDIU sp, sp, 0x40

Night Taxi.code:
; NAME: Night Taxi
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|Taxi
; PARAM: Space|DropOff

; Credit: Code repurposed from various shop events created by Rain and Airsola™

ADDIU SP SP -80 ; Including 4 byte pad
SW RA 76(SP)
SW S7 72(SP)
SW S6 68(SP)
SW S5 64(SP)
SW S4 60(SP)
SW S3 56(SP)
SW S2 52(SP)
SW S1 48(SP)
SW S0 44(SP)

; Load the board ram address with the convenience time flag at T0.
LUI T0 hi(board_ram10)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(board_ram10)
; Load the value at T1.
LBU T1 0(T0)

; Convenience Flag
; 0000 0000 Day (Dawn)
; 0001 0000 Day
; 0000 0001 Night (Dusk)
; 0001 0001 Night

; Check if it is Night
ANDI T1 T1 1
BEQZ T1 NoTaxi ; ignore if it is Day
NOP

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex
NOP
ADD S3 V0 R0 ; move V0 to S3
ADD A0 V0 R0 ; move V0 to A0
LI A1 -1 ; animation to set, idle
JAL SetBoardPlayerAnimation
LI A2 0x02 ; looping

LUI A0 hi(Taxi_chain_index)
ADDIU A0 A0 lo(Taxi_chain_index)
LUI A1 hi(Taxi_chain_space_index)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(Taxi_chain_space_index)
JAL GetAbsSpaceIndexFromChainSpaceIndex
NOP

ADDU A2 R0 V0 ; stores space index for the Taxi
; Rotate player model to face down.
ADDU A0 R0 S3 ; move player index to A0 again
ADDIU A1 R0 12 ; 12 frames
JAL RotatePlayerModel
NOP

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 13 ; wait 13 frames

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x39F ; Podoboo sound

MOVE A0 S3 ; move player index to A0
LI A1 10 ; minimum coin value required
JAL PlayerHasCoins
NOP

BEQZ V0 TooPoor ; V0 has 0 if player cannot afford
NOP

Offer:
ADDI A0 R0 -1 ; Character image (-1 for none)
LUI A1 hi(OpenDeal)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(OpenDeal)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
SW R0 0x0010 (SP)
SW R0 0x0014 (SP)
SW R0 0x0018 (SP)
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

ORI A0 R0 0x0002
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
ORI A1 R0 0x0000 ; AI always picks yes, safest bet
MOVE S0 V0 ; move V0 to S0
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP
LI T0 0x01 ; No index
BEQ S0 T0 NoDeal
NOP
LI T0 0x02 ; View Map index
BEQ S0 T0 ViewMap
NOP

DidBuy:
MOVE A0 S3 ; Current Player's Index
JAL AdjustPlayerCoinsGradual
LI A1 -10 ; Amount of Coins to lose

MOVE A0 S3 ; Current Player's Index
JAL ShowPlayerCoinChange
LI A1 -10 ; Amount of Coins to show

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 30 ; Sleep 30 frames to wait for coins

ADDIU A0 R0 0x0 ; Bar Fade
JAL 0x80062050 ; InitFadeOut
LI A1 16 ; 16 frames

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 20 ; wait 20 frames

; Clear any backwards flag.
LUI T5 hi(p1_status_flags) 
ADDIU T5 T5 lo(p1_status_flags) ; we will use the offset from this address to get the other players

LI T6 0x38 ; load offset between player structs at T6
MULTU T6 S3 ; multiply offset by player index
NOP
MFLO T6 ; store result of multiply at T6
NOP

ADDU T5 T5 T6 ; add player offset to p#_status_flags
LBU T6 0(T5) ; offset for p#_status_flags
ANDI T6 T6 0xFE ; mask for all except last bit, to remove backwards bit
SB T6 0(T5) ; store status flag with backwards bit removed

; Load player onto the DropOff space.
JAL GetPlayerStruct ; player struct at V0
MOVE A0 S3 ; player index at A0
MOVE S4 V0 ; store player struct at S4

MOVE A0 S3
LI A1 DropOff_chain_index
LI A2 DropOff_chain_space_index
JAL SetPlayerOntoChain
NOP

LI A0 DropOff_chain_index
LI A1 DropOff_chain_space_index
JAL GetAbsSpaceIndexFromChainSpaceIndex ; actual space index at V0
NOP

JAL GetSpaceData ; space data struct at V0
MOVE A0 V0 ; space index was at V0

ADDIU V0 V0 8 ; offset for X position of the space
LW T1 0(V0) ; store X pos at T1

ADDIU V0 V0 8 ; offset for Y position of the space (from X position)
LW T2 0(V0) ; store Y pos at T2

LW V1 0x24(S4) ; load player struct data at offset 0x24 to V1
ADDIU V1 V1 0xC ; add offset of 0xC to get current player's X position
SW T1 0(V1) ; store X position into player struct

ADDIU V1 V1 8 ; add offset of 8 to get current player's Y position
SW T2 0(V1) ; store Y position into player struct

LI A0 -1 ; Set current player
LI A1 1 ; rotate for 1 frame...
JAL RotatePlayerModel
LI A2 DropOff

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 20 ; wait 20 frames

LI A0 0x0 ; Bar Fade
JAL 0x80061FE8 ; InitFadeIn
LI A1 16 ; 16 frames

JAL SleepProcess
LI A0 17 ; wait 17 frames

J exit
NOP

ViewMap:
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J Offer
NOP

TooPoor:
ADDI A0 R0 -1 ; Character image (-1 for none)
LUI A1 hi(PlayerTooPoor)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(PlayerTooPoor)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
SW R0, 0x0010 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0014 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0018 (SP)
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

J exit
NOP

JAL 0x800EC6EC

NOP

LUI A1 hi(DayVisit)

exit:

Solstice Event.code:
; NAME: Solstice Event
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct

ADDIU SP SP -40
SW RA 36(SP)
SW S1 32(SP)
SW S0 28(SP)

; Load the board ram address that stores the time of day at S1.
LUI S1 hi(board_ram9)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(board_ram9)
; Load the value at S1.
LBU S0 0(S1)

; Check if solstice event is happening, set at T0.
ANDI T0 S0 0x30 ; 0011 0000 bit mask

; Day bits
; 0000 0000 0x00
; 0000 0001 0x01
; 0000 0010 0x02
; 0001 0000  0x10
; 0001 0001  0x11
; 0001 0010  0x12
; 0001 0011  0x13
; 0010 0001   0x21
; 0010 0010   0x22

; Night bits
; 0000 0011 0x03
; 0000 0111 0x07
; 0000 1011 0x0B
; 0001 0111  0x17
; 0001 1011  0x1B
; 0010 0011   0x23
; 0010 0111   0x27
; 0010 1011   0x2B
; 0010 0000   0x20

; If solstice isn't happening, prompt the player choice.
BEQZ T0 playerWish
NOP

JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x2A8 ; Tumble hi sound

; Otherwise, say a solstice event is already happening.
ANDI T0 S0 0x10 ; 0001 0000 bit mask
BEQZ T0 alreadyNightSolstice
NOP

alreadyDaySolstice:
LUI A1 hi(DaySolsticeAlready)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(DaySolsticeAlready)

J alreadySolstice
NOP

alreadyNightSolstice:
LUI A1 hi(NightSolsticeAlready)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(NightSolsticeAlready)

alreadySolstice:
LI A0 0x15 ; Character image (Tumble)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
SW R0, 0x0010 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0014 (SP)
SW R0, 0x0018 (SP)
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP

J exit
NOP

playerWish:
JAL PlaySound
LI A0 0x2A8 ; Tumble hi sound

; Load the board ram address with the convenience time flag at T0.
LUI T0 hi(board_ram10)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(board_ram10)
; Load the value at T1.
LBU T1 0(T0)

; Convenience Flag
; 0000 0000 Day (Dawn)
; 0001 0000 Day
; 0000 0001 Night (Dusk)
; 0001 0001 Night

; Check if it is Night.
ANDI T0 T1 0x1 ; Bit indicating Night
BEQZ T0 isDay
NOP

isNight:
LI A0 0x15 ; Character image (Tumble)
LUI A1 hi(LunarPrompt)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(LunarPrompt)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
SW R0 0x0010 (SP)
SW R0 0x0014 (SP)
SW R0 0x0018 (SP)
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

ORI A0 R0 0x0002
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
ORI A1 R0 0x0000 ; AI always picks yes
MOVE S0 V0 ; move V0 to S0
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP
LI T0 0x01 ; No index
BEQ S0 T0 exit
NOP
LI T0 0x02 ; View Map index
BEQ S0 T0 ViewMapNight
NOP

; Load the value at S1.
LBU S0 0(S1)
ORI S0 S0 0x20 ; Flip Night Solstice flag on.
SB S0 0(S1)

J exit
NOP

ViewMapNight:
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP
J isNight
NOP

ViewMapDay:
JAL ViewBoardMap
NOP

isDay:
LI A0 0x15 ; Character image (Tumble)
LUI A1 hi(SolarPrompt)
ADDIU A1 A1 lo(SolarPrompt)
ADDU A2 R0 R0
SW R0 0x0010 (SP)
SW R0 0x0014 (SP)
SW R0 0x0018 (SP)
JAL 0x800EC8EC ; ShowMessage
ADDU A3 R0 R0

ORI A0 R0 0x0002
JAL GetBasicPromptSelection
ORI A1 R0 0x0000 ; AI always picks yes
MOVE S0 V0 ; move V0 to S0
JAL 0x800EC9DC
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6C8
NOP
JAL 0x800EC6EC
NOP
LI T0 0x01 ; No index
BEQ S0 T0 exit
NOP
LI T0 0x02 ; View Map index
BEQ S0 T0 ViewMapDay
NOP

; Load the value at S1.
LBU S0 0(S1)
ORI S0 S0 0x10 ; Flip Day Solstice flag on.
SB S0 0(S1)

exit:
LW RA 36(SP)
LW S1 32(SP)
LW S0 28(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 40

Warp Players Back In.code:
; NAME: Warp Players Back In
; GAMES: MP3_USA
; EXECUTION: Direct
; PARAM: Space|ActualSpace
; PARAM: Space[]|HiddenSpaces

; Hook to at the start of each player turn to ensure players are always on an actual space.

; HiddenSpaces is an array that contains every HiddenSpace, should the current player
; have been warped to a different HiddenSpace to avoid started a duel.

; Each HiddenSpace is an empty space with X/Y coordinates identical to a landable space,
; with the assumption that a warp event will warp them onto a HiddenSpace, we want them to
; go be placed on the landable space found on that X/Y coordinates.

; ActualSpace is the landable space that the HiddenSpace is overlaid on, we wanted to warp
; the player here but doing so would have triggered the ActualSpace's event. This code
; will prevent that from happening.

; Credit: Code repurposed from various warp events created by Airsola™ and MarioComix

ADDIU SP SP -80 ; Including 4 byte pad
SW RA 76(SP)
SW S7 72(SP)
SW S6 68(SP)
SW S5 64(SP)
SW S4 60(SP)
SW S3 56(SP)
SW S2 52(SP)
SW S1 48(SP)
SW S0 44(SP)

; S0 Current index of space Array
; S1 HiddenSpaces chain_index Array
; S2 HiddenSpaces chain_space_index Array
; S3 HiddenSpaces Array Length
; S4 Player index
; S5 Float offset for X position
; S6 HiddenSpaces chain_index at current index
; S7 HiddenSpaces chain_space_index at current index

; S1 contains the array for chain_index of each hidden space, starts at 0.
LUI S1 hi(ArrayChain)
ADDIU S1 S1 lo(ArrayChain)

; S2 contains the array for chain_space_index of each hidden space, starts at 0.
LUI S2 hi(ArrayChainSpace)
ADDIU S2 S2 lo(ArrayChainSpace)

; S3 contains the length of the array.
LUI S0 hi(ArrayLength)
ADDIU S0 S0 lo(ArrayLength)
LBU S3 1(S0)

; S5 contains the float offset to place each player model's X position.
LI S5 0x00000000 ; float value for 0

; S0 is the index to be iterated through for the space array.
ADDU S0 R0 R0 ;set to 0

;;;;;; Loop through all the hidden spaces to see if there are players present.
loopSpaces:

; S4 is used to search through each player index: [0, 1, 2, 3]
ADDU S4 R0 R0 ;set to 0

; S6 is the chain_index of the array at index S0
LBU S6 1(S1)
; S7 is the chain_space_index of the array at index S0
LBU S7 1(S2)

;;;;;; Loop through all the players.
loopPlayers:
; Set the address for p1_char under T5.
LUI T5 hi(p1_char) 
ADDIU T5 T5 lo(p1_char) ; we will use the offset from this address to get the other players

LI T6 0x38 ; load offset between player structs at T6
MULTU T6 S4 ; multiply offset by player index
NOP
MFLO T6 ; store result of multiply at T6
NOP

ADDU T5 T5 T6 ; add player offset to p#_char

; Check if the player's cur_chain_index and cur_space_index match a hidden space.
; T1 is the chain_index of the player.
ADDIU T0 T5 12 ; offset for p#_cur_chain_index from p#_char
LBU T1 0(T0)
BNE S6 T1 ignorePlayer ; ignore moving the player if the chain index is not equal.
NOP
; T2 is the chain_space_index of the player.
ADDIU T0 T5 13 ; offset for p#_cur_space_index from p#_char
LBU T2 0(T0)
BNE S7 T2 ignorePlayer ; ignore moving the player if the space index is not equal.
NOP

movePlayer:
; Set the player's space to the actual space.
MOVE A0 S4
LI A1 ActualSpace_chain_index
LI A2 ActualSpace_chain_space_index
JAL SetPlayerOntoChain
NOP

JAL GetCurrentPlayerIndex ; event triggering player index at V0
NOP
MOVE T4 V0 ; store current player index at T4

JAL GetPlayerStruct ; player struct at V0
MOVE A0 S4 ; player index at A0
MOVE T0 V0 ; store player struct at T0

LI A0 ActualSpace_chain_index
LI A1 ActualSpace_chain_space_index
JAL GetAbsSpaceIndexFromChainSpaceIndex ; actual space index at V0
NOP

JAL GetSpaceData ; space data struct at V0
MOVE A0 V0 ; space index was at V0

ADDIU V0 V0 8 ; offset for X position of the space
LW T1 0(V0) ; store X pos at T1

ADDIU V0 V0 8 ; offset for Y position of the space (from X position)
LW T2 0(V0) ; store Y pos at T2

BEQ T4 S4 centered
NOP

MTC1 S5 F0 ; store incremental X position float (offset) at F0
MTC1 T1 F1 ; store space X position float to F1
SUB.S F0 F1 F0 ; subtract from offset
LI T1 0x41000000 ; float value for 8
MTC1 T1 F1 ; store right centered offset to F1
ADD.S F0 F0 F1 ; add right centered offset to the space X position
MFC1 T1 F0 ; store sum at T1

LI T3 0x41000000 ; float value for 8
MTC1 T3 F0 ; store offset at F0
MTC1 T2 F1 ; store space Y position float at F1
SUB.S F0 F1 F0 ; subtract offset to the space Y position
MFC1 T2 F0 ; store result at T2

LI T3 0x41000000 ; float value for 8
MTC1 S5 F0 ; store incremental X position float at F0
MTC1 T3 F1 ; store offset value to F1
ADD.S F0 F0 F1 ; add offset value to X position for next player
MFC1 S5 F0 ; store sum at S5

J setPosition
NOP

centered:
; Lower the Y position a bit to leave room for players already on the space.
LI T3 0x41000000 ; float value for 8
MTC1 T3 F0 ; store offset at F0
MTC1 T2 F1 ; store space Y position float at F1
Add.S F0 F1 F0 ; add offset to the space Y position
MFC1 T2 F0 ; store result at T2

setPosition:
LW V1 0x24(T0) ; load player struct data at offset 0x24 to V1
ADDIU V1 V1 0xC ; add offset of 0xC to get current player's X position
SW T1 0(V1) ; store X position into player struct

ADDIU V1 V1 8 ; add offset of 8 to get current player's Y position
SW T2 0(V1) ; store Y position into player struct

ignorePlayer:
SLTI T0 S4 3 ; is S4 < 3? (Player 1 is 0, Player 4 is 3, any greater is invalid)
BEQZ T0 exitLoopPlayers ; exit loopPlayers since all players have been iterated.
NOP

J loopPlayers
ADDIU S4 S4 1 ; iterate to next player

exitLoopPlayers: ; continue the loop
ADDIU S0 S0 1 ; iterate the index of the array

; Check if index is beyond the end of the array, exit the loop if so.
SLT T0 S0 S3 ; is S0 < S3? (is the index less than the length still?)
BEQZ T0 exitLoopSpaces ; exit loopSpaces since all spaces have been iterated.
NOP

ADDIU S1 S1 2 ; iterate to next space's chain_index
ADDIU S2 S2 2 ; iterate to next space's chain_space_index

J loopSpaces ; continue the loop
NOP

exitLoopSpaces:

exit:
LW RA 76(SP)
LW S7 72(SP)
LW S6 68(SP)
LW S5 64(SP)
LW S4 60(SP)
LW S3 56(SP)
LW S2 52(SP)
LW S1 48(SP)
LW S0 44(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 80

.align 16
ArrayChain:
.halfword HiddenSpaces_chain_indices
ArrayChainSpace:
.halfword HiddenSpaces_chain_space_indices
ArrayLength:
.halfword HiddenSpaces_length

additionalbgcode.code:
; Customize the background used each turn!
; This function runs at the start of each turn.
; The default background is available as DEFAULT_BG.
; Additional backgrounds are available as ADDITIONAL_BG_#,
; e.g. ADDITIONAL_BG_1 for the first added background.
ADDIU SP SP -4
SW RA 0(SP)

; T2 has the board ram address.
; T3 has the board ram value.

; Load the value for the current turn at T1.
LUI T0 hi(current_turn)
ADDIU T0 T0 lo(current_turn)
LBU T1 0(T0)

; Load the board ram address that stores the time of day at T2.
LUI T2 hi(board_ram9)
ADDIU T2 T2 lo(board_ram9)
; Load the value at T3.
LBU T3 0(T2)

; Load the board ram address with the convenience time flag at T6.
LUI T6 hi(board_ram10)
ADDIU T6 T6 lo(board_ram10)
; Load the value at T7.
LBU T7 0(T6)

; Convenience Flag
; 0000 0000 Day (Dawn)
; 0001 0000 Day
; 0000 0001 Night (Dusk)
; 0001 0001 Night

; If it is the first turn, we need to set the board ram to 0.
BNEZ T1 changeBackground
NOP

; Set the board ram value to 0 in case board ram isn't reset.
ADDIU T3 R0 0 ; set to 0
SB T3 0(T2)

LUI T4 hi(board_ram11)
ADDIU T4 T4 lo(board_ram11)
SB T3 0(T4) ; set to 0

LUI T4 hi(board_ram12)
ADDIU T4 T4 lo(board_ram12)
SB T3 0(T4) ; set to 0

LUI T4 hi(board_ram13)
ADDIU T4 T4 lo(board_ram13)
SB T3 0(T4) ; set to 0

J setDayBG
NOP

changeBackground:
ANDI A0 T7 1 ; mask for Night bit
BEQZ A0 setDayBG
NOP

setNightBG:
LI V0 ADDITIONAL_BG_1
J exit
NOP

; Return the background index in V0.
setDayBG:
LI V0 DEFAULT_BG

exit:
LW RA 0(SP)
JR RA
ADDIU SP SP 4
